text:
I will treat about the task 3. However, I will not ask for a grant so as to go abroad or to do an internship, I will ask for subventions for the BDE, which I am taking part as the co-president.
Hello,
I saw your first opinion about the subsidies we as the BDE are asking for and I wanted with this e-mail do some precisions about it. Let me remind you what the BDE is doing for the life of the school and the life of the students. We are truly taking part to the animation of the school by many ways. First of all, we are the link the students and the administration need at any time. If a student has a question to ask to administration about the possibility to make an internship abroad or even an useless question, he can instead ask to us and we would be able to answer him.
Secondly, we are a real backup for the administration. The BDE is welcoming new students by making a small speech the first day. We are also present for some events like the graduation ceremony or the open doors day. The BDE also has a "tutoring pole" which is really helpfull for students that may have some difficulties in a few classes. That allows the school to maintain the amount of people interested in the education given by the school.
Then, the last part but not the least, the BDE is during all the year organizing partys, events, sports meetings and inter-schools tournaments. First duties are free to us and just take our time. We are volunteer to do that, but in return we would be gratefull if the school accords us subventions. Indeed, events we are organizing are non-profits events. Actuallly, we lose money on these events.
For example, at the end of september, one of our biggest event will take place : the integration week-end, also called the WEI. During a full week-end, starting from 5 pm on friday to 3 pm on sunday, new students will party, play some games and basically have fun. The camping is secured and a secourists team will be on place. It is a fundamental event for all the students in the school. We have to pay a company that organize such events for that. Unfortunately, we will not be able to pay all the charges without your help.
Sincerely yours,
Alex Dupont, co-president of the BDE
